content: I work in a totally different type of business in an industry a world away from this, in a completely different lifecycle stage, and I work in a field and status wildly different to yours. And yet I identify with this article at least as much as any other publication I’ve read in the last 40-odd years, and head-and-shoulders more than most of the utter management-bullshit passing across my desk whether literally 40 years ago or figuratively in this electronic age.
